title: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and attempting to add Javadoc, no action is performed.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and attempting to add Javadoc, the Javadoc should be successfully added to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Select a field in the view.
3. Attempt to add Javadoc to the selected field.
4. Verify that no action is performed and the Javadoc is not added to the field.
